item.title: Hyperapp
item.description: There’s quite popular JS lib that’s 315 lines of code and has capabilities of react + redux in it. It’s called Hyperapp and you can view the code there https://github.com/hyperapp/hyperapp/blob/master/src/index.js. I need to investigate how actions part is done and maybe it’s viable solution if you care about minimal size and want something sane.
